comment: Professor Benzidan takes thinking, in all its forms, seriously. He taught me to think for myself, but not the dead thinking that values the collection of ideas for future exchange. Rather, he taught me the thinking that is vital, relational, alive, creative, beautiful

I only put 1 on helpfulness and clarity because it wouldn't let me put a 0. If you ask him a question he answers with a question, and he wants us all to have his opinions not our own because he we think wrong. I DO NOT recommend this teacher what so ever!
I dont wear my seatbelt driving to this class because if I die on the way there I wont have to go
